verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Fairest Lord Jesus, Ruler of all nature, O Thou of God and man the Son. Thee will I cherish, Thee will I honor, Thou, my soul’s glory, joy, and crown.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Beautiful Savior! Lord of the nations! Son of God and Son of man! Glory and honor, praise, adoration, Now and forevermore be Thine!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
